name: dsp-js-native
description: High-performance DSP library with native C++ acceleration and Redis state persistence

scripts.test: node --import tsx --test src/ts/__tests__/MovingAverage.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/Rectify.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/RMS.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/Variance.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/ZScoreNormalize.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/Chaining.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/Redis.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/CircularLogBuffer.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/Tap.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/MeanAbsoluteValue.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/TimeSeries.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/TopicRouter.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/TopicRouterAdvanced.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/TopicRouterPriority.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/ListState.test.ts src/ts/__tests__/DriftDetector.test.ts
scripts.build-gyp: node-gyp rebuild && node -e "require('fs').cpSync('build/Release/dsp-js-native.node', 'src/build/dsp-js-native.node', {force:true}); console.log(`Copied build/Release/dsp-js-native.node to src/build/dsp-js-native.node`);"
